item.title: 中国市场令人失望，新兴市场受到冲击，货币下跌
item.description: 亚洲新兴市场货币和南非兰特出现回落，原因是中国的政策制定者似乎令期待财政措施提振经济前景的投资者失望。【原文：Emerging-market currencies in Asia and the South African rand retreated as China’s policy makers appeared to disappoint investors expecting fiscal measures to boost the economic outlook.】

item.title: 土耳其反垄断机构在广告技术调查中对谷歌罚款 7500 万美元
item.description: 土耳其反垄断监管机构对谷歌处以 26.1 亿里拉（7500 万美元）的罚款，称该公司为自己的供应方平台提供了不公平的优势，牺牲了竞争对手的利益。【原文：Turkey’s antitrust regulator fined Google 2.61 billion liras ($75 million), saying the company provided an unfair advantage to its own supply-side platform at the expense of rivals.】

item.title: 500% 的涨幅显示了埃隆-马斯克对大胆基金的欣喜若狂
item.description: 随着唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在美国大选中获胜，世界首富的财富急速增长，从华尔街基金到小型日间交易商，那些敢于在埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的商业帝国上大举下注的人在今年年底都获得了丰厚的回报。【原文：From Wall Street funds to small-time day traders, those who dared to bet big on Elon Musk’s business empire are closing out the year with hefty payoffs, as Donald Trump’s US election win turbocharges the fortunes of the world’s richest man.】

item.title: 欧洲农民担心南方共同市场协议后竞争加剧
item.description: 经过 25 年的酝酿，欧盟与南美南方共同市场集团之间的贸易协议终于近在眼前。但欧盟农民对该协议将如何影响他们的生意惶恐不安。【原文：After 25 years in the making, a trade deal between the European Union and South American Mercosur bloc is finally in sight. But EU farmers are on tenterhooks over how it will impact their business.】

item.title: 经济学家称，美联储将在 2025 年放缓步伐前再次削减货币政策
item.description: 据彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）调查的经济学家称，美联储官员将在本月连续第三次降息，并缩减他们预计明年降息的次数。【原文：Federal Reserve officials will lower interest rates this month for a third straight time and pare back the number of rate cuts they anticipate next year, according to economists surveyed by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 贝宁彩票公司 6900 万美元首次公开募股后首次亮相即获收益
item.description: 贝宁国家彩票公司（Loterie Nationale du Bénin SA）是西非国家的国营彩票公司，在首次公开募股 6,900 万美元后，首次上市便上涨了 4.1%。【原文：Loterie Nationale du Bénin SA, the West African nation’s state-run lottery company, rose 4.1% in its trading debut following a $69 million initial public offering.】

item.title: 微策略公司的 500% 增长标志着迈克尔-赛勒的黄金时代
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的当选可能是点燃最近美国市场投机之火的一根火柴。但坐在这一切中间的人是迈克尔-赛勒（Michael Saylor）。【原文：Donald Trump's election may have been the match that lit the speculative fires burning at every edge of US markets these days. But the person sitting in the middle of it all is Michael Saylor.】

item.title: 卡塔尔航空公司在与空中客车公司和解后寻求放弃波音 737 飞机
item.description: 据熟悉相关讨论的人士透露，卡塔尔航空公司正寻求从其订单中剔除波音公司的 737-10 机型，因为该机型不再符合其机队需求。【原文：Qatar Airways is looking to strike the Boeing Co. 737-10 model from its order book because the aircraft no longer meets its fleet requirements, according to people familiar with the discussions.】

item.title: 英国家庭预期通胀率自 2023 年以来首次上升
item.description: 英格兰银行的一项调查显示，英国家庭预计未来 12 个月的物价上涨速度将加快，这凸显了人们对英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）将于 10 月份公布的大额支出预算可能会刺激通货膨胀的担忧。【原文：British households expect the pace of price rises to tick upwards in the next 12 months according to a Bank of England survey that underscores concerns Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves’ big-spending budget in October may stoke inflation.】

item.title: 尽管采取了刺激措施，中国信贷增长仍意外放缓
item.description: 尽管国债销售强劲并采取了刺激措施，但中国 11 月份的信贷扩张仍出乎意料地同比放缓，凸显出融资需求不振。【原文：China’s credit expansion unexpectedly slowed in November from a year ago despite strong government bond sales and stimulus measures, underscoring faltering demand for financing.】

item.title: 蒙古出现 "重大问题 "后，特拉菲古拉利润下降 62
item.description: 创辉集团（Trafigura Group）报告称，由于其蒙古石油业务被指控存在员工不当行为，该公司蒙受了 11 亿美元的损失，利润急剧下降。【原文：Trafigura Group reported a sharp drop in profit as it took $1.1 billion in losses related to alleged employee misconduct in its Mongolian oil business.】

item.title: Galaxy Digital 据称将聘请 Point72 的 Paquette 担任首席财务官
item.description: 银河数字控股有限公司（Galaxy Digital Holdings Ltd.）聘请 Point72 首席财务官安东尼-帕奎特（Anthony Paquette）担任亿万富翁迈克尔-诺沃格拉茨（Michael Novogratz）经营的加密货币集团的相同职务。【原文：Galaxy Digital Holdings Ltd. hired Point72 Chief Financial Officer Anthony Paquette to serve in the same capacity at the crypto conglomerate run by billionaire Michael Novogratz, according to a person familiar with the appointment.】

item.title: 美银美林称政治局宣誓后投资者抢购中国股票
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp.）的策略师表示，由于中国领导人誓言采取更多刺激措施来推动经济增长，投资者在过去一周再次将资金投入中国股市。【原文：Investors poured money into Chinese stocks over the past week again as the country’s leaders vowed to boost growth with more stimulus measures, according to Bank of America Corp. strategists.】

item.title: 天然气机组拍卖失败，波兰电力市场风险增加
item.description: 在一次重要的市场拍卖会上，波兰电力公司计划的天然气发电机组未能获得任何支持，因此波兰在本十年晚些时候越来越容易出现电力短缺。【原文：Poland is becoming increasingly prone to power shortages later this decade after gas-fed power units planned by the utilities failed to win any support at a key market auction.】

item.title: 押注日本央行将按兵不动，日元将创 6 月以来最长连跌纪录
item.description: 由于交易商押注日本央行下周不会加息，日元对美元汇率创下 6 月以来最长连跌纪录。【原文：The yen was headed for its longest losing streak versus the dollar since June as traders bet that the Bank of Japan will refrain from raising interest rates next week.】

item.title: 苹果将于 2025 年初开始在印度南部组装 AirPods
item.description: 苹果公司将于明年初开始首次在印度生产 AirPods 无线耳机，这标志着这家 iPhone 制造商在中国以外稳步推进多元化进程的一个里程碑。【原文：Apple Inc. will begin producing its AirPods wireless earphones in India for the first time early next year, marking a milestone in the iPhone maker’s steady push to diversify beyond China.】

item.title: 德国央行称 2025 年德国经济难有增长
item.description: 根据德国联邦银行（Bundesbank）的最新预测，德国经济在今年再次萎缩后，2025 年将很难实现增长。【原文：Germany’s economy will hardly grow in 2025 after shrinking again this year, according to fresh forecasts from Bundesbank.】

item.title: 特斯拉供应商倒闭显示莫桑比克骚乱后果日益严重
item.description: 随着数周来愈演愈烈的选举抗议活动演变成一场叛乱，莫桑比克的经济正陷入困境。【原文：Mozambique’s economy is buckling as weeks of intensifying election protests evolve into a revolt that’s increasingly being felt beyond the borders of the southern African nation.】

item.title: 越南就贪污问题对前总统发出纪律 "警告
item.description: 越南政治局对违反反腐规定的前总统阮春福发出了纪律 "警告"，这是全面反腐运动的最新举措，该运动已使数百名官员和企业高管深陷其中。【原文：Vietnam’s Politburo has issued a disciplinary “warning” to former president Nguyen Xuan Phuc for violating anti-corruption regulations, the latest step in a sweeping anti-graft campaign that has ensnared hundreds of officials and business executives.】

item.title: 据说性感茶叶计划在美国上市而非在香港上市
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，湖南茶跃文化产业发展集团有限公司（又称 "性感茶"）正寻求在美国而非香港进行首次公开募股。【原文：Hunan Chayue Cultural Industry Development Group Ltd., also known as Sexy Tea, is looking to do an initial public offering in the US instead of Hong Kong, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 亨索尔特希望在加强防守的同时雇佣无人问津的汽车团队
item.description: Hensoldt AG 正在洽谈从两家汽车零部件供应商处招聘多达 100 名员工，因为这家国防承包商希望扩大产能，以满足最近激增的军事订单需求。【原文：Hensoldt AG is in talks to hire full teams of up to 100 workers from two auto parts suppliers as the defense contractor looks to expand capacity to meet the recent surge in military orders.】

item.title: 大华银行财务总监李惠辉离职二十年
item.description: 大华银行（United Overseas Bank Ltd.）首席财务官李惠辉（Lee Wai Fai）在任职二十年后将于明年卸任。【原文：United Overseas Bank Ltd.’s Chief Financial Officer Lee Wai Fai is set to step down next year after two decades in the role.】

item.title: 高级官员称中国人民银行誓言防范外汇冲击
item.description: 中国人民银行的一位高级官员表示，中国人民银行将改进对汇率预期的管理，并在明年防范任何冲击。【原文：The People’s Bank of China will improve how it manages exchange rate expectations and guard against any shocks next year, according to a senior bank official.】
